### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/MFT1_3.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/MFT1_3_valid.qmd).

- Indicative Map (**code: MFT1.3.IM.orig**, version v2.1) requires review 
 - Indicative Map (**code: MFT1.3.IM.orig**, version v2.0) replaced 
 - Web navigation (**code: MFT1.3.web.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: MFT1.3.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **GlobalSaltmarshes2017** (McOwen et al. 2017).
 - **MEOW-2008** (Spalding MD et al.  2008).
 - **Tropical-Wetlands-v2** (Gumbricht et al. 2017).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset               |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|:---------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|GlobalSaltmarshes2017 |<https://data.unep-wcmc.org/datasets/43>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|MEOW-2008             |<https://www.worldwildlife.org/publications/marine-ecoregions-of-the-world-a-bioregionalization-of-coastal-and-shelf-areas>{target='links'} :: <https://databasin.org/datasets/3b6b12e7bcca419990c9081c0af254a2>{target='links'} :: <http://maps.tnc.org/gis_data.html>{target='links'} |
|Tropical-Wetlands-v2  |<http://www.cifor.org/global-wetlands/>{target='links'} :: <https://www.cifor.org/knowledge/dataset/1614/>{target='links'} :: <https://doi.org/10.17528/CIFOR/DATA.00058>{target='links'}                                                                                               |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**MFT1.3.IM.orig** (v2.1): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

**MFT1.3.web.orig** (v1.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.MFT1_3_web_orig){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset               |license_info                                                                                             |
|:---------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|GlobalSaltmarshes2017 |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/legalcode                                                 |
|MEOW-2008             |Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 License :: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0 |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Spalding MD, Fox HE, Allen GR, Davidson N, Ferdaña ZA, Finlayson M, Halpern BS, Jorge MA, Lombana A, Lourie SA, Martin KD, McManus E, Molnar J, Recchia CA, Robertson J (2007) *Marine ecoregions of the world: a bioregionalization of coastal and shelf areas*. **Bioscience** 57: 573–583. DOI:[10.1641/B570707](https://doi.org/10.1641/B570707)
  
 - McOwen CJ, Weatherdon LV, van Bochove JW, Sullivan E, Blyth S, Zockler C, Stanwell-Smith D, Kingston N, Martin CS, Spalding M, Fletcher S  (2017) *A global map of saltmarshes* **Biodiversity Data Journal** 5: e11764 [DOI:10.3897/BDJ.5.e11764](http:dx.doi.org/10.3897/BDJ.5.e11764) 
 - Thomas Gumbricht Rosa Maria Roman‐Cuesta Louis Verchot Martin Herold Florian Wittmann Ethan Householder Nadine Herold Daniel Murdiyarso (2017) *An expert system model for mapping tropical wetlands and peatlands reveals South America as the largest contributor* **Glob Change Biol.** 23: 3581– 3599 [DOI:10.1111/gcb.13689](http:dx.doi.org/10.1111/gcb.13689)
